author: dcposch
content: 2. for 4865, a point of clarification. correct me if I'm wrong but I think that *all* balance changes in current Ethereum are the result of either a transaction or block reward. 4865 could mention that all software that tracks the history of an account (block explorers, chain analysis tools, wallets, etc) will have to add support for a third type of balance-changing event.
